title: What technologies are in a light bulb? - Quora

response.answer_text: What technologies are in a light bulb? Technologies used in a simple light bulb.. Power source : you can not truly have a light bilb if it does not light up.Metallurgy: you need a tungsten coil and lead wires.Glass manufacture and moulding: you need to make a glass container that you need to be able to seal later.Inorganic Chemistry : you need the argon or nitrogen.
